scripts.flame: yarn clinic flame --kernel-tracing -- -- node -r ts-node/register/transpile-only -r tsconfig-paths/register

scripts.bubbleprof: yarn clinic bubbleprof -- -- node -r ts-node/register/transpile-only -r tsconfig-paths/register
scripts.heapprofiler: yarn clinic heapprofiler -- -- node -r ts-node/register/transpile-only -r tsconfig-paths/register
